metadata.dc:author: Chiner Vives, E
Andreu Rodríguez, A L
Pastor Esplá, E
Jiménez Ródena, J
Gómez Merino, E
Tordera Higón, P
metadata.dc:description: We present two cases of chronic eosinophilic pneumonia in two women of a seventy-seven and sixty-five years old. We revised the clinical and radiologic features, and their pathogenesis. It is necessary to recognize in a precocious time this entity and the utility of the bronchoalveolar lavage fluid in the diagnostic, for to begin a treatment with corticosteroids.
metadata.dc:title: Dos nuevos casos de neumonía eosinófila crónica. Revisión de la literatura.
[Two new cases of chronic eosinophilic pneumonia. A revision of the literature].
